content: मेचक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [<ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 5. 37</ls>] Black, dark-blue, dark-coloured कुर्वन्न जनमेचका इव दिशो मेघः समुत्तिष्ठते <ls>Mk. 5. 23</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 25</ls>; <ls>Me. 59.</ls> --कः {@--1@} Blackness, the dark blue-colour. {@--2@} An eye of a peacock's tail; <ls>Māl. 6. 5.</ls> {@--3@} A cloud. {@--4@} Smoke. {@--5@} A nipple. {@--6@} A kind of gem. --कं {@--1@} Darkness. {@--2@} Sulphuret of antimony.
